entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 9.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Int'l Airport 8:00 PM PDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 9.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 78 %
Dewpoint: 5.8°C
Wind: ESE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early this evening except 40 near Juan de Fuca Strait. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:20 PM PDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers changing to 70 percent chance of showers near noon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then southwest 40 late in the afternoon except gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:20 PM PDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers early in the evening and 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h except gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:20 PM PDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
